definitions.definition: affect (a person, organism, cell, etc.) with a disease-causing organism.
examples: there is no evidence that the virus can infect humans
synonyms: contaminate "he didn't want to infect others with his chickenpox"

definitions.definition: contaminate (air, water, etc.) with harmful organisms.
examples: contaminate, pollute, taint, foul, dirty, blight, damage, ruin; poison nitrates were infecting rivers

definitions.definition: (of a negative feeling or idea) take hold of or be communicated to (someone).
examples: the panic in his voice infected her
